title: Tadej Pogačar and his Paris-Roubaix Rig: Colnago V4Rs, 32mm, No Gimmicks
content:
Pogačar opts for the Colnago V4Rs for cycling’s toughest day with a near-identical setup he used to win Tour of Flanders, except for one major tweak.

Read the full article at Tadej Pogačar and his Paris-Roubaix Rig: Colnago V4Rs, 32mm, No Gimmicks on Velo.
author: ahood
